title: PARALEGAL/ a
job_overview:
Our company is looking for the best paralegal/ bookkeeper available that can help us navigate though various both legal and financial duties across our multiple businesses. where are looking for some one that understand the structure of legal and financial framework in the United States and is equipped with the skills mentioned below in order to fulfill the job requirements. 
* can do pre demand letters 
* Write and prepare lawsuits 
* Can create a contract 
* Can edit documents 
* Can prepara a client for arbitration and write the briefs 
* Can collect or extract documents and information from customers and companies to fulfill the requirements of the task. 
* Can follow up Comunications with all parties
* Can track income and expenses daily
* Can create an invoice and record payments 
* Can assist in collection process of funds though all means available. 
*  Can create financial statements. 

Aside from that, we are looking for some one punctual, that is reliable and has a positive attitude toward any challenge that they may face, If you have the following skills please send us a message to schedule an interview
